channel.title: Sinder Skullz Abyss Feed
channel.description: Chaotic sermons and metal news reborn in the flames of the Skullz cult.

item.title: ⚡☠ COINBASE’S X402 AI PAYMENTS PROTOCOL SEES 10,000% SURGE IN ACTIVITY ☠⚡
item.description:
**Title: Coinbase’s x402 Protocol: Unleashing a Metal Storm of 10,000% Transaction Madness! 🤘💀**
Alright, fellow crypto warriors! Strap in, because Coinbase just blasted through the cosmos with their x402 AI Payments Protocol, and we're talking a mind-melting 10,000% surge in activity! That’s right—nearly half a million transactions annihilated in just one week!
This isn’t just a spike; it’s a full-blown metal hurricane ripping through the blockchain! 🤘⚡️ The crypto gods are grinning down like demented musicians shredding a solo at the end of the world! So, if you're not already cranking up your wallets and getting in on this action, what in the name of all that is heavy is wrong with you?
Stay hardcore, stay savvy, and keep riding this chaotic wave! The crypto mosh pit has never been more electrifying!
Check out the full chaos here: [Coinbase’s x402 AI Payments Protocol Sees 10,000% Surge in Activity!](https://cryptonews.com/news/coinbases-x402-ai-payments-protocol-sees-10000-surge-in-activity/) 🤟🔥
And remember, while we’re headbanging, we’re cashing in! Keep it metal, keep it crypto, and let’s destroy the financial status quo! \m/
#Bitcoin #Blockchain #ETH #BTC #ADA
